sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react';
import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom';
import {Button, Form, Dropdown,DropdownButton, Card, Container} from "react-bootstrap";
import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap';
import {Context} from "../index";
import '../css.css';


const CreateRecipe = ({show, onHide}) => {
    const {recipe} = useContext(Context)
    const {type} = useContext(Context)
    return (
        
        <Modal 
        show={show}
        onHide={onHide}
        size="lg"
        aria-labelledby="contained-modal-title-vcenter"
        centered
      ><Container className="form">
        <Modal.Header closeButton>
            <Modal.Title id="contained-modal-title-vcenter">
                Добавление рецепта
            </Modal.Title>
        </Modal.Header>
        <Modal.Body>
            <Form>
                <Form.Control placeholder={"Введите название рецепта"}/>
                <Dropdown className="mt-2 mb-2">
                    <Dropdown.Toggle >Выберите тип блюда</Dropdown.Toggle>
                    <Dropdown.Menu>
                        {recipe.types.map(type =>
                            <Dropdown.Item key={type.id}>{type.name}</Dropdown.Item>    
                        )}
                    </Dropdown.Menu>
                </Dropdown>
                
                
                <Dropdown className="mt-2 mb-2">
                <Dropdown.Toggle> Время приготовления</Dropdown.Toggle>
                    <Dropdown.Menu>
                        <Dropdown.Item>15</Dropdown.Item>
                        <Dropdown.Item>30</Dropdown.Item>
                        <Dropdown.Item>45</Dropdown.Item>
                        <Dropdown.Item>60</Dropdown.Item>  
                        </Dropdown.Menu>
                </Dropdown>
                
                <Dropdown className="mt-2 mb-2">
                    <Dropdown.Toggle>Сложность</Dropdown.Toggle>
                    <Dropdown.Menu>
                            <Dropdown.Item>Легко</Dropdown.Item>
                            <Dropdown.Item>Средне</Dropdown.Item>
                            <Dropdown.Item>Сложно</Dropdown.Item>    
                    </Dropdown.Menu>
                </Dropdown>
                <Form.Control className="mt-3" placeholder="Введите краткое описание рецепта"/>
                <Form.Control className="mt-3" type="multiplace" placeholder="Введите рецепт"/>
                <Form.Control className="mt-3" type="file"/>

                

            </Form>
        </Modal.Body>
        <Modal.Footer>
            <Button className="recbut" onClick={onHide}>Закрыть</Button>
            <Button className="recbut" onClick={onHide}>Добавить</Button>
        </Modal.Footer>
        </Container></Modal>
    );
  }
  
export default CreateRecipe;
